image.title: wordpress – Mornir – Pagan Metal aus Freising

item.title: Welcome to the Drums, Wolfgang!
item.dc:creator: wordpress
item.description: We are happy to welcome Wolfgang as a new band member on the drums! Some may know him from his work with Munarheim (munarheim.de) and if you don’t know him yet, you can check out his playthrough of “Altvordere Macht”. We are looking forward to make music together and to be on stage again soon!

item.title: Mornir confirmed for Metalheadz Village Festival 2019
item.dc:creator: wordpress
item.description: Saturday, 28.09.2019 We are happy to announce that we got a slot at this year’s Metalheadz Village Festival on Saturday, 28.09.2019. It will be a party for us and we hope to meet some familiar faces – see you in the Village! Event (facebook): https://www.facebook.com/events/427065824812869/ Tickets (35€ per 2-day-pass): https://www.metalheadz-ev.de/qsot-event/metalheadz-village-festival-2019/27_09-2019-1730/

item.title: Single “Hexer” released
item.dc:creator: wordpress
item.description: After a long wait we can finally share our single “Hexer” with the two songs “Herr in Wind und Tälern” and “Hexer” with you! The recordings took place at Michael Wöß’sW-Audio-Studio . The artwork is by Chira Tane and Adrian Liedtke (Captured). We offer the songs as free download onBandcamp, as well as stream on all usual platforms and Youtube. You can find the physical CD at concerts and on Bandcamp, we hope you like … Continue reading Single “Hexer” released

item.title: Mornir as Support for Lagerstein @Backstage Munich, 28.08.2019
item.dc:creator: wordpress
item.description: We’re happy to announce that we will support the australian Pirate-Metal band Lagerstein on 28th of August 2019 at the Backstage Munich! Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/570781040083933/ Tickets:MT:  https://www.muenchenticket.de/guide/tickets/27gyb/Lagerstein.htmlCTS: https://www.eventim-light.com/de/a/5bd3197036340e0001a15046/e/5cb06f32d03b210001afad5a/BS: https://www.backstagetickets.eu/lagerstein-live-2020.html
